issues.shortMessage: Remove this initialization to "_refreshContactsCancelable", the compiler will do that for you.
issues.fullMessage: The compiler automatically initializes class fields to their default values before setting them with any initialization values, so there is no need to explicitly set a field to its default value, but doing. Further, under the logic that cleaner code is better code, it's considered poor style to do so.

properties.title: Fields should not be initialized to default values
